text: Prusias is a genus of huntsman spiders that was first described by Octavius Pickard-Cambridge in 1892. ==Species== it contains four species, found in Peru, Brazil, Panama, and Mexico: *Prusias brasiliensis Mello-Leitão, 1915 – Brazil *Prusias lanceolatus Simon, 1897 – Brazil or Peru *Prusias nugalis O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1892 (type) – Mexico, Panama *Prusias semotus (O. Pickard- Cambridge, 1892) – Panama ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of North America Category:Spiders of South America Category:Taxa named by Octavius Pickard-Cambridge
title: Prusias (spider)
